Class Droid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Entity
      • Droid
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Astromech, Medical

    public abstract class Droid
extends Entity
    Droid is an abstract representation of an entity name and HP.
    Author:
    Nicholas Grant
